name: Megan Smith
title: Program Coordinator
about: Megan is RoboReachâ€™s Program Coordinator, with 10 years experience as Logistical Director and Relations Lead at IBM. He focuses on day-to-day operations, ensuring smooth programming, as well as ensuring all students receive the proper tools they need to successfully complete the program.

name: Brian Simpson
title: Content Developer
about: Brian has spent 24 years in the robotics industry working for various companies such as Boston Dynamics, Amazon, and Boeing, with 5 years of experience as a high school STEM educator. He currently focuses on creating material for our upper level programs focusing on kit and intention design.

name: Marc Piper
title: General Operations Manager
about: Marc is the General Operations Manager of Roboreach, ensuring that each part of our program is executed to the highest level. He has 9 years of experience as Regional Director at Walmart and 5 years of working experience as Logistics Manager at Google.

name: Shannon Aiello
title: Development Lead
about: Shannon is the Development Lead for RoboReach, ensuring the technical sides of our programs are always up and running. He has 5 years experience at IBM as a Client Engineer, and 3 years working at Twitch.

name: Lauren Doe
title: Outreach Director
about: Lauren is the Outreach Director of RoboReach, strengthing the relationship between our organization and the community. She has previously spent time in the Salvation Army as Corporate Relations Manager, ensuring a positive relationship between donors and the organization.

name: Isaak Humphrey
title: Content Developer
about: Isaak has spent 5 years as a STEM educator in various high schools around the RTP area, teaching students innovations and design through hands-on activities. He currently develops material for our Common and Challenge builds, focusing on ease-of-learning and ensuring students can transfer the skills they have learned into their daily lives.
